title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1646 - Development Period Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1646 - Development Period Accounting

State Regulations

Subpart 1646-1 - General (§ 1646-1.1)

Subpart 1646-2 - Development Cost Budget (§ 1646-2.1 to 1646-2.3)

Subpart 1646-3 - Requisitions Of Loan Funds (§ 1646-3.1 to 1646-3.3)

Subpart 1646-4 - Land Acquisition (§ 1646-4.1 to 1646-4.3)

Subpart 1646-5 - Contracts (§ 1646-5.1 to 1646-5.7)

Subpart 1646-6 - Initial Operating Period (§ 1646-6.1 to 1646-6.4)

Subpart 1646-7 - Periodical Financial Reports-development (§ 1646-7.1 to 1646-7.13)

Subpart 1646-8 - Physical Completion (§ 1646-8.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1646

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
